701580f-a.folder: Paulding Avenue & Sacket Avenue, Bronx, NY
701580f-a.text:
Paulding Ave., nnorth from Sacket Ave., as it appears after completion; having been cut through the center of the former Morris Park Race Track. This and other thoroughfares were laid out in 1913 by the sellers of the fammous track relative to its sale in the summer of 1913 by Joseph P. Day and J. Clarence Davies. On the extreme left of the photo (top corner) is visible the Morris Park Race Tracl Club House. For additional data see the "New York Times" of April 27, June 15, and
Jumne 22, 1913.
Spring 1913.
BROwN BROTHERS.
